Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/St.Louis
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/St.Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/St.Louis.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Harlem (O'Hare). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Harlem (O'Hare).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
